text: Ely Dagher is a Lebanese director, screenwriter and artist known for his short film Waves '98. ==Early years== Previously he had received a Bachelors in graphic arts and illustration as well as a Bachelors in animation at the Academie Libanaise Des Beaux Arts in Lebanon.Une première pour le Liban : Ely Dagher Palme d'or du court-métrage à Cannes| http://www.lorientlejour.com/article/926523/ely-dagher-remporte-la-palme-dor- du-court-metrage-a-cannes.html ==Career== His film Waves '98 won the Short Film Palme d'Or at the 2015 Cannes Film Festival, becoming the first Lebanese film to ever receive the award.Festival De Cannes | AWARDS – Short Film Palme d'or | http://www.festival-cannes.fr/en/article/62012.htmlLebanon’s Ely Dagher Wins Palme D’Or in Cannes for Waves ’98 | http://35mmfrombeirut.com/keeward/lebanons-ely-dagher-wins-palme-dor-in- cannes-for-waves-98/ ==Filmography== * Waves '98, 2015 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Lebanese film directors Category:Writers from Beirut Category:Alumni of Goldsmiths, University of London
title: Ely Dagher
